EmailTemplate.description: this email is for new subscriber promo from the AQRM push
EmailTemplate.name: AQRM promo email
EmailTemplate.subject: Unrestricted access and risk matrix data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I work for Compliance Week, the leading information service on corporate compliance. As {!Account.Name} currently doesn’t have access to our service, I invite you to join and receive a custom Accounting Quality + Risk Matrix (AQRM) report by Audit Analytics. This due diligence report has a $500 value, and it is available as a complimentary benefit for a limited time.
Compliance Week provides critical, independent guidance for financial, legal, risk, audit, and compliance executives at public companies such as Goldman Sachs, the Dun & Bradstreet Corp., NYSE, and Visa.
Activate your license today, and your AQRM report will be delivered within 10 days … Simply reply to this e-mail to begin your subscription for $999.
Still not sure? I’d be happy to share with you a sample AQRM report, or you can sign up for a free 10-day no-obligation trial.
Please feel free to call or e-mail with any questions.
Thanks!
